FuncDef: The clear link neighbor command deletes LAD neighbor information of interfaces.
CLIs: clear link neighbor [ { interface { <interface-name> | { <interface-type> <interface-number> } } } | { slot <slot-id> } ] { sub-interface | all }

ParaDef.Info:
Deletes LAD neighbor information of a specified interface.
-

Deletes LAD neighbor information of a board in a specified slot.
-

Deletes LAD neighbor information of all sub-interfaces.
-

Deletes LAD neighbor information on all interfaces.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Before querying LAD neighbor information on a device or a specified interface during a period, run the clear link neighbor command to delete all LAD neighbor information or LAD neighbor information on the specified interface.
